Documentation

Documentation

Learn SnapTray through task-driven tutorials and feature references in one place.

Start here: learn by outcome

If your goal is to get work done quickly, start in Tutorials. These guides are scenario-based and include step-by-step execution.

Most-used paths

  1. Need a screenshot in 30 seconds: Quick Share (30s)
  2. Need a reproducible issue report: Bug Report Workflow
  3. Need always-visible references: Live Reference with Pin
  4. Need a short demo video: Recording Demo

Build your foundation

Complete these once, then you can use every tutorial faster:

  1. Getting Started
  2. Hotkeys
  3. Settings
